name: Byox
description:
Byox is a post-war world that currently faces a big disease - and the only one who can save it is the one who carries the key. In this Puzzle game you will control Basil, a young man who found Tarragon's staff. After his finding he felt inspired by the old tales and decided to help cure this disease.

Discover the mysteries of this library and help him!! But first, do you have what is needed to help him??
